Plot dimensionality reduction assays

Source: R/plotting.R
plotReduction.Rd

Plot dimensionality reduction assays

plotReduction(
  bank,
  reduction = NULL,
  components = c(1, 2),
  by = NULL,
  type = c("discrete", "continuous"),
  pt.size = 0.5,
  pt.alpha = 0.7,
  col.midpoint = NULL,
  col.low = "blue",
  col.mid = "gray95",
  col.high = "red",
  col.discrete = NULL,
  main = NULL,
  main.size = 5,
  legend = TRUE,
  legend.text.size = 6,
  legend.pt.size = 3
)

Arguments

bank

BanksyObject

reduction

(character) reduction to visualize

components

(numeric vector) which components to visualize

by

(character) groupings for cells

type

(character) type of groupings (one of 'discrete' or 'continuous')

pt.size

(numeric) size of points

pt.alpha

(numeric) transparency of points

col.midpoint

(numeric) for continuous labels - midpoint of color gradient

col.low

(character) for continuous labels - color gradient low

col.mid

(character) for continuous labels - color gradient mid

col.high

(character) for continuous labels - color gradient high

col.discrete

(character) for discrete labels - colors for groupings

main

(character) title

main.size

(numeric) size of title

legend

(logical) show legend

legend.text.size

(numeric) size of legend text

legend.pt.size

(numeric) size of legend point

Value

Dimensionality reduction plot

Examples

# Generate a simulated dataset
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
bank <- NormalizeBanksy(bank)
bank <- ScaleBanksy(bank)
bank <- ComputeBanksy(bank)
#> Computing neighbors...
#> Spatial mode is kNN median
#> Parameters: k_geom = 15
#> Done
#> Computing harmonic m = 0
#> Using 15 neighbors
#> Done
bank <- RunBanksyPCA(bank, lambda = 0.2)
#> Running PCA for M=0 lambda=0.2
#> BANKSY matrix with own.expr, F0
#> Squared lambdas: 0.8, 0.2
names(reduction(bank))
#> [1] "pca_M0_lam0.2"
plotReduction(bank, by = 'Label', type = 'discrete')
